post.author: Enforcer
post.body: Anyone know of or can make a app that can display .fx files instead of running the game's fx editor?

post.author: ctressle
post.body: ANY reply from the team would be appreciated.

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body: No such application exists. Nobody (unless you're willing to learn how to program) is willing to commit the time and effort to write one.
